<h1 align="center">
  E-Auction site with Gatsby and Drupal 8.9
</h1>
<h2 align="center">
  Installation:
</h2>

<ol>
<li> <strong> npm install</strong> or <strong>yarn install</strong> to fetch all the required modules.   
</li>
<li>
<strong> gatsby-source-drupal </strong> need a base url for the Drupal instance. change the baseurl to your Drupal instance base url.
</li>
<li> All requests except the <i>all auction && auciton detail</i> are using rest. The rest are implemented using REST API.</li>
</ol>
